pattern: Repeated gate failure: npm -w packages/docs run test
prevention: Review the failing gate output and add a prevention step or test.

pattern: Repeated gate failure: npm run format
prevention: Run `npm run format:write` (or Prettier on touched files) before `ato q done` so the format gate passes; avoid manual table edits without formatting.

pattern: Repeated gate failure: npm -w packages/ui-primitives run test
prevention: Run `npm -w packages/ui-primitives run test` before `ato q done` when primitives change; if it fails, inspect the latest `primitives-test-*.log` and fix before re-running gates.
